summary: The text discusses the hardships faced by pregnant and nursing women during times of persecution, such as the Antichrist or the Roman captivity, and emphasizes the difficulty of escape due to physical burdens. It advises praying that their flight doesn't occur in winter or on the Sabbath when travel is difficult due to cold or religious laws. The text also mentions maintaining faith and love in Christ and not becoming inactive in God's work, relating to the world's end and spiritual perseverance.
